description:
Gon`s neighbor, Mikuo is a little rascal who`s been sent on his first errand. As Mikuo is still very young, Gon decides to accompany him. Mikuo`s behavior is so unpredictable that even the kind and helpful Gon gets exasperated.
Tama and the others find an abandoned kitten in a corner of the shrine`s grounds away from the area where preparations for the shrine`s big festival are progressing. Determined to save the weakened kitten, Tama and the others race around Third Street trying to find help, but everyone is out, gone to attend the festival. Finally, they find Takeshi-kun and Emi-chan, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴンのお使い / まつりばやし
